Note: we can't reproduce it, and our crash collector shows it's very rare. Please send us email if you have a stable reproduce for crashes. email: chillyroominc@gmail.com

* New mode: 2-player co-op. 
A quick how-to:
Method 1: connect to the same wifi network.
Method 2: make one device the hotspot, and have the other device connect to it.

How is multiplayer different from single player:
1. Fight by your friend's side!
2. Chance to get multiplayer-only ring weapons. Those rings will trigger special attacks that only work when the other player is present. Each player will get one ring, and you can get more by playing with others with different rings.
3. Chests that require two players to unlock.
4. When a room battle is triggered, the other player gets teleport to the room as well.
5. buff can only be chosen by the host.
6. Players can revive each other. If both die, the game ends.
7. All players get gems, coins and energy orbs.
8. If one player leaves the game, progress is saved but will only continue as single player.

* Heroes will randomly show up in the dungeon, and offer the player help.
* Vending machines randomly show up in the dungeon, and sell potions and weapons.
* Weapons are further classified into 6 colors, white, green, blue, purple, orange, and red. Red weapons can only be obtained by special means.
* Added 15 new weapons, with a total of 145 weapons now.
* Higher chance of dropping boss weapon in boss chest.
* Shield can block bullets, but not laser or melee weapons.
* New weapon, floating gun, will automatically attack when stashed as secondary weapon.
* Improved attack speed of staff weapons.
* Adjusted Devil's Snare(level 1 boss) attack pattern.
* Display gem count in main room.
* Engineer's max-level buff changed to fire shield.
* Vampire's skill will regenerate energy if health is full.
* Fixed a great number of bugs.
